description: This Dart source file defines a PurchasesService class that interacts with an API to handle purchase-related operations, including listing and creating purchases. It imports models for paginated data and purchase details, as well as an API client for making HTTP requests.

classes.name: PurchasesService
classes.description: Provides methods to list and create purchase records by communicating with a backend API.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of Purchase objects from the API.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new purchase record with specified details and sends it to the API.
